website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Duramo 8 is a running shoe that integrates form and function. According to many consumers, it can be worn daily as a casual running shoe or it can be used for other activities and light forms of exercise. Those who are looking for a budget-friendly shoe that fits the need for daily comfort and support, the Adidas Duramo 8 is a solid option.
pros: Many users complimented the shoe for being very comfortable
One user with a bad runner’s knee was particularly happy with the level of comfort the shoe provided
Users accounted that the shoe delivered in terms of what they were designed for – to support and stabilize the foot
The testers felt that the shoe is sufficiently-cushioned while they were walking or running
Most users appreciated the versatility of the shoe as they found them to be fit for different activities and exercises
The overall look of the Adidas Duramo 8 is eye-catching and very sporty, based on a number of reviews
Reviewers welcomed the addition of the ortholite insole, which provided additional cushioning and an anti-microbial function
Several testers highlighted that the shoes are of the best value
For them, the price is affordable for the design and construction of the shoe
Despite being more muted compared to the colorways of its predecessor, testers still admired the available color schemes
cons: Numerous reviewers wrote that the length of the shoes was just right but the width felt too restricting
A number of female testers observed that the shoe felt too wide in the toe area
The Adidas Duramo 8 had to be broken in, based on multiple reviews
Apparently, they felt too tight when first worn

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer but go a size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality and comfy trainer. I exercise every day and these are my second pair, as they can take a pounding. You need to be aware that you need to upsize though! I'm normally a 10 but bought half size bigger and it wasn't enough, so sent them back and got a size 11 which fit like a glove. They look fantastic and several people commented so. Very happy indeed. 4/5 is a great and realistic score.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, sole could use more cushioning, must buy bigger size
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good but the sole isn't cushioned quite as much as I would have hoped for running on asphalt. Also, the size specification is almost pure fiction. I usually wear 8.5 (UK size) but had to order the Duramo in size 10. They are relatively narrow as well, far narrower than my old Asics, and tapering off toward the front pretty soon. In the right size they are very comfortable and I'm happy with them now. Not too expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but beware!
customer_reviews.text: As usual with Adidas trainers, they fit 1/2 a size small which is why I sized up. However the plastic used for design that borders the toe vamp causes it to feel suffocating towards the end of your foot; it may also dig slightly into the top of your foot which is what happened to me. As long as you go up a size and don't have particularly strong/wide feet the trainer should fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am size 9 so got 9 1/2 and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very light trainers ideal for running. I purchased half size larger than normal after reading previous reviews that ese were a little smaller than standard. I am size 9 so got 9 1/2 and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Half size bigger than usual but still narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Duramo 8. I`m usually UK8, EU 42 but since the previous Duramos were somewhat narrow I have purchased these a half size bigger - 8.5. It seems to me they are just the same as my old ones - still smaller than expected. Maybe I should consider buying one size bigger next time. Other than that they are very comfy and don`t need any break in.
customer_reviews.author: Svetoslav Gavasoff

customer_reviews.title: Tidy
customer_reviews.text: Advised to go for a size larger than normal. Spot on. Fit perfectly. Very comfortable to wear and run in. Have run a few miles a couple of times in them so far and they seem to provide good stability and excellent cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: For narrow feet only
customer_reviews.text: Have bought Duramo trainers for many years now. Like most Adidas footwear products they are designed for narrow feet. These have a narrower toe box than previous Duramo designs - fine for me, but beware if you have average to wide feet. Quality is good. Very comfortable. Don't look bad either.
customer_reviews.author: tecnobuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes but as a 3rd time purchaser of ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but as a 3rd time purchaser of Duramos (I have generation 5 and 6 ones) I was very disappointed and had to return them. The issue is where the lacing starts is much further up the foot away from the toes than in previous models. The now fixed area around where the toes join the foot is far far too tight for me. when placed side by side with my old pair I can see that my lacing position has the same area between 5-10mm higher then than the fixed area in these ones.
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great style
customer_reviews.text: Bought these twice if not 3 times now for my incredible growing son... these trainers are fabulous for the money. Stylish and comfortable always.
customer_reviews.author: Cdplates

customer_reviews.title: The look great but thats the only good feature
customer_reviews.text: The look great but thats the only good feature. The size is way off, get the next size up at least I bought these for running and the duramo 7s are amazing, but these offer far less support for your feet, they definitely went for style over quality on these, so i reccommend getting the duramo 7s for running.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need to order at least half a size up on your normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews prior to ordering (Phew !!!). Ordered half a size up (8.5 instead of 8) and glad I did as they're a perfect fit. That aside, a great running shoe that weighs nothing and is indeed like floating on a cloud. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Crook

customer_reviews.title: like just looking at them but very comfortable when on
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before i bought these trainers, so i take 10 & half so i ordered a full size bigger and they fit..another review mentioned that they are slim fitting, they are when you hav'nt got them on , like just looking at them but very comfortable when on..still they are quite stylish..4* rating because of those 3 isues..
customer_reviews.author: roosterman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly narrow!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third pair of Adidas running shoes but they are disappointingly narrow. My feet are a little wider than ‘normal’ but I go up 1/2 a size to compensate...these are still too narrow. They’ve been returned.
customer_reviews.author: James F

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes lasted a few hundred miles
customer_reviews.text: nice comfortable running shoes and cheap enough to replace quickly
customer_reviews.author: Lopsey

customer_reviews.title: obviously I cant send them back as they are now used so they're now useless and may as well go in the bin
customer_reviews.text: These are not UK 11's, I thought maybe they were tight because they were new and so I carried on using at the weekends a few weeks later, obviously I cant send them back as they are now used so they're now useless and may as well go in the bin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liga

customer_reviews.title: Cool trainers
customer_reviews.text: The cloud foam soles are very comfortable very good looks
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Great only ever really buy adidas trainers as the quality for the cost is pretty unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... what my son was looking for and at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was looking for and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Londonmum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as expected from Adidas & super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Steve White

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers but I had to return them and get the next half size up. Great value for money in the sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.text: Bought these before they fit the bill perfectly so got them again and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit very well compared to the 7 version to narrow so uncomfortable to wear not very impressed
customer_reviews.author: perry

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very light and made of good materials, but too tight compared to others of ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very light and made of good materials, but too tight compared to others of same brand and size.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Viglione

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really really comfortable shoes. Perfect for the gym and they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rowan-Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: spot on trainers and supporting my knees brilliantly. will be getting these again
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Adidas trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice Trainers, a little low on the heel but decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift but his face was a picture :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Jane Burke

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pair of Adidas for every day use or running. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: good quality trainer but its worth going in the shop ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality trainer but its worth going in the shop to get the right fit as they came up to small
customer_reviews.author: David Choules

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light,paid for quicker delivery but still took 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs V J O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks like a really nice shoe, too bad the size was too small. next I'll order 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ini

customer_reviews.title: Ordered my normal size was too tight in width and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my normal size was too tight in width and length would advise anyone to order a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Lee Rauer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, too small though best getting 1 maybe even 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took Them Back
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look & styling of these but Adidas's sizing & fit is ridiculous. I have always found their sizing a bit odd . I am a 10 & have never had to buy any footwear larger than this but on these i had to try an 11 which fitted on the length but despite being one size bigger than normal were bizarrely too tight across the width & hence they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Golfboy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. The sizes have shrunk, now in danger of losing a toenail
customer_reviews.text: I would leave these well alone. Always used Adidas for my running and I always bought UK size 12.5. However these were smaller than 12.5. I thought I was imagining it, however I now have two black big toenails, with a danger of now losing one of them. Can't imagine what Adidas thought they were doing. If I could be bothered to sue them I would.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Good price when I bought it but definitely fits shorter compared to other models/brands at the same size
customer_reviews.author: paolo

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Duramo 8 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These lightweight men's running shoes have air mesh upper for maximum breathability and breathable mesh lining. Synthetic midfoot and heel overlays for added stability and support. Enjoy the comfort and performance of ecoortholite® sockliner. Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning. Adiwear outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability.
